summary: This document is a financial statement from Bank of America detailing account activity for the period from January 1, 2011, to January 31, 2011. It lists the account holders and provides information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance for the account.

persons.name: Leon D Black
persons.context: Leon D Black is listed as one of the account holders for the financial statement.

persons.name: Debra Black
persons.context: Debra Black is listed as one of the account holders for the financial statement.

persons.name: Melanie Spinella
persons.context: Melanie Spinella is mentioned as the Power of Attorney for the account holders.

connections.description: Leon D Black and Debra Black are listed as joint account holders.
Melanie Spinella acts as the Power of Attorney for Leon D Black.
Melanie Spinella acts as the Power of Attorney for Debra Black.

keyFacts: The financial statement covers the period from January 1, 2011, to January 31, 2011.
The account holders are Leon D Black and Debra Black.
Melanie Spinella is designated as the Power of Attorney for the account holders.
The ending balance of the account as of January 31, 2011, is $848,408.77.
Significant transactions include deposits of $20,724,721.06 and withdrawals totaling $23,171,592.73.
